html.OD_PDP_DOWN_PAYMENT_MODAL_HTML:
Due to the nature of your account history, we'll need a down payment for your device before we can start your monthly payments.

This payment will be required if you choose to purchase the device in store as well. But don't worry, this is something we ask of many customers, so you're not alone.

Plus a down payment means your monthly payments will be even lower going forward.

label.OD_PDP_PRICE_MODAL_TITLE_TEXT: How would you like to view prices?
label.OD_PDP_SHIP_BY_MODAL_DESCRIPTION1_TEXT: This item is currently out of stock, but if you place your order we'll ship it as soon as we have more.
label.OD_PDP_SHIP_BY_MODAL_DESCRIPTION2_TEXT: Our shipping dates are just estimates, but we'll be sure to email you when your order is on the way
label.OD_PDP_SHIP_BY_MODAL_DESCRIPTION3_TEXT: Don't worry.you won't be charged until your order ships.
label.OD_PDP_DOWN_PAYMENT_MODAL_TITLE: Make a down payment and you'll be all set
label.OD_PDP_SPLASH_SCREEN_DESCRIPTION: Trade in a device for up to $200, customize a new one, and we'll help you transfer what's important.
label.OD_PDP_ANNUAL_UPGRADE_WARNING_TITLE: Your new device is not eligible for annual upgrade.
label.OD_PDP_ANNUAL_UPGRADE_WARNING_SUBTITLE: You may still upgrade to this device, but you will no longer have the benefits of the annual upgrade program.
label.OD_PDP_RETAIL_PRICE_TEXT: Total price will be due today.
label.OD_CART_LIMIT_EXCEEDED_HEADER: You've hit the maximum number of devices for this transaction.
label.OD_CART_LIMIT_EXCEEDED_MSG: If you still want to add this device, you can empty your cart, replace a device in your cart or finish this purchase as a separate transaction.
label.OD_PDP_SPLASH_SCREEN_TITLE_AAL: Get a new device right here, right now.
label.OD_PDP_SPLASH_SCREEN_DESCRIPTION_AAL: Get free 2-day shipping. Your order will be at your doorstep in no time, at no additional cost to you.
label.OD_PDP_ANNUAL_UPGRADE_TITLE: Your new device is not eligible for annual upgrade.
label.OD_PDP_ANNUAL_UPGRADE_CONTENT: You may still upgrade to this device, but you will no longer have the benefits of the annual upgrade program.
label.OD_RESTRICTED_MF_APP_ITEM_SUBTITLE:
Get the new Google Pixel 2.
Up to $300 off when you buy it through the My Verizon app.
Plus, get a Google Home Mini on us.
label.OD_RESTRICTED_MF_APP_ITEM_DESCRIPTION:
Don't have a Verizon account? No problem, just come back tomorrow to pre-order the device.

Select trade-in required
label.OD_RESTRICTED_MF_APP_ITEM_LEGAL_TEXT: Up to $949.99 device payment purchase required. Less up to $300 trade-in credit applied over 24 months, begins w/in 2-3 billing cycles and ends when balance is paid or line terminated; 0% APR. Eligible trade-in must be in good working and cosmetic condition. Google Home Mini mailed within 3-6 weeks after receipt of claim.
label.OD_PDP_PROMO_PAGE_BODY_HTML1:
Get up to $300 off the Google Pixel 2 with trade-in. Plus, get a Google Home Mini on us.

How it works
Step 1: Purchase a Google Pixel 2 or 2 XL between Oct 4, 2017 and Oct 18, 2017 and trade-in one of the smartphones listed below.
Step 2: Receive and activate your new Google Pixel 2.
Step 3: Get your free Google Home Mini in the mail within 2-4 weeks post device activation.
Get up to $300 off the Google Pixel 2
Trade in select smartphones in good working condition to get up to $300 off in trade-in credit applied toward your monthly device payment.

label.OD_PDP_PROMO_PAGE_BODY_HTML3:
Get a Google Home mini on us
Google Home Mini mailed within 2-4 weeks after device activation. Available to customers who preorder a Google Pixel 2 or Google Pixel 2 XL 10/4/17 through 10/18/17. Must submit proof of purchase online within 30 days of activation. Limit one Google Home Mini per qualifying device purchase. A $50 Visa Prepaid card will be provided to customer in the event the Google Home Mini devices run out of stock. Termination of service prior to 6 months after activation will result in a chargeback in the amount of $50. Void in PR and where prohibited or restricted by law. Google Home Mini will be shipped to account billing address, which must be within the fifty (50) United States or District of Columbia (DC).
